description: This file implements core functions for the 'Ansc Query Interface' object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It defines how the object is instantiated and managed within a C-based object-oriented framework, including memory allocation, object setup, and cleanup.

classes.name: ANSC_QUERY_INTERFACE_OBJECT
classes.description: Core object structure representing the 'Ansc Query Interface' with function pointers for lifecycle and interface management.

classes.name: PANSC_COMPONENT_OBJECT
classes.description: Base class structure for component objects, providing common member fields and functions.

classes.name: PANSC_QUERY_INTERFACE_OBJECT
classes.description: Pointer to the 'Ansc Query Interface' object, extending the base component object.

classes.name: PANSC_ATOM_TABLE_OBJECT
classes.description: Object managing a table of atomic elements used within the interface, referenced during object cleanup.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscQioCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new 'Ansc Query Interface' object, setting up its function pointers and context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscQioRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the 'Ansc Query Interface' object, freeing resources and performing cleanup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscQioEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enlists all subordinate objects needed by the interface, creating auxiliary tables if necessary.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscQioInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the object's structure, setting identifiers, function pointers, and base class members.
